creator: bijuramachandran@yahoo.com
text:
Hallo,

   I am trying jmeter1.9.1 (i tried nightly build jakarta-jmeter-20040312 
too) "SOAP/XML-RPC Request" for login and i am getting SESSIONID as response.  
It is working perfect.  

I want to use this SESSIONID in the next "SOAP/XML-RPC Request".  

 My problem is that, i cannot pass that previous SESSIONID (from login 
response) to following xml requests.  

Please help me to solve this problem & tell me how can i pass session id to 
following xml requests.  

If possible please show sample xml requests too.

Thank you in advance,

Biju

creator: bijuramachandran@yahoo.com
text:
i tried Regular Expression Extractor to extract SESSIONID from login response 
(1) and use it in next XML request(2)

1)XML login response example:  
LoginResponse sessionid="123456789123456789"

2) next XML request:
<m:functionRequest sessionid="">

i tried "Regular Expression Extractor" and it is not passing session id from 
(1) to (2)'s sessionid="".  

Please tell me how can i use this "Regular Expression Extractor"?

Thank you in Advance,
biju

now i found a way with regular expression and it is working perfectly....  so 
it is not a bug.

Thank you,

Biju
creator: bijuramachandran@yahoo.com

text:
if anyone need help with jmeter regular expression, you can contact me per 
email 

regards
biju
